features: Tide + Downy liquid detergent offers Tide's powerful cleaning and freshness plus the color protection of Downy.
Loaded with softening ingredients that add a smooth layer of comfort to the fibers in your fabrics.
With a more concentrated formula, you get more cleaning agents and less water in every drop. *vs. previous formula
Works in laundry loads for both HE and non-HE washing machines.
America's #1 Trusted Detergent Brand* *Tide is Consumers' #1 Trusted laundry detergent brand in Readers Digest survey
body.description: Tide with Touch of Downy liquid laundry detergent combines Tide's powerful cleaning and freshness with the color protection of Downy. It is loaded with softening ingredients to add a smooth layer of comfort to the fibers in your fabrics. It is now more concentrated to provide more stain removal and freshness and less water*. From America's #1 Trusted Detergent Brand** to cover your many laundry needs. Also try our small but powerful Tide PODS laundry pacs.Measure your loads with cap. For medium loads, fill to bar 1. For large loads, fill to bar 3. For HE full loads, fill to bar 5. Add clothes, pour into dispenser, start washer.* vs. previous formula** Tide is Consumers' #1 Trusted laundry detergent brand in Readers Digest survey

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our go to detergent, and great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Our family has been using this detergent for years, and it works very well for us. A few of us also have sensitive skin, and have had no issues at all.Our clothes always feel very clean, and there is no scent after washing (yay!). If you are sensitive to smells and perfumes, you should not have an issue with this detergent.A little also goes a long way, so we see great value for the cost. We'll continue buying this product and are very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: We looked for a brand that was going to work with some of our families skin sensitivity but also cleaned the clothes well and came out smelling fresh. After many tries, this was our keeper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Packaging and delivery are horrible
reviews.reviewText: Product is great have used Tide for years. Unfortunately when we get delivery of this product, for last two or three deliveries, the product arrives leaking out in the bag its in or inside the box. We may be forced to purchase this from another source.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Whisk is our current staple, subscription makes it perfect
reviews.reviewText: Laundry detergent is a constant "must have" and since I have no intention of going back to making my own soap, purchasing is a "have to", often. As the current standard form for washers is liquid, buying in stores, and lugging it home has become an onerous task, so I am absolutely delighted to be able to get it on subscription so that it always arrives and I never run out. We like whisk because it both gets the clothes clean, using a modest amount, and leaves less goopy scent left on the clothes - you know that scent goo attracts dirt and other odors, right? I will be happy when the figure out how to make a concentrate that can be mixed with regular water somehow - thereby reducing the volume that has to be lugged or shipped, but I do understand that water quality variability makes that difficult for manufacturers, so, for now, this works. Very happy with both the detergent's sunctioning and the subscription service!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Free and clear indeed!
reviews.reviewText: I love being able to buy the big containers of laundry, less trips to the store with laundry waiting to be done! My husband has also asked that we keep the same detergent since it makes the clothes smell so clean! It is free and gentle for sure, but it still leaves your clothes smelling fresh!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well good value
reviews.reviewText: Tide Free & Gentle Liquid Laundry Detergent has seamlessly integrated into my laundry routine, offering a compelling combination of power and gentleness. Ideal for sensitive skin, its hypoallergenic formula, free from dyes and perfumes, ensures a thorough clean without compromising the integrity of fabrics. The 146 fl oz bottle, compatible with high-efficiency machines, provides excellent value with its capacity for 100 loads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and effective
reviews.reviewText: Really like this unscented detergent. It is simple and effective. We purchased so that we could move away from scents on fabrics for our baby, and while we were skeptical (we admittedly associated good smells with clean and therefore performance), we are really satisfied with how this product works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always Does the Job Well
reviews.reviewText: I've used this product for several years now. It works well: the cleaning results & high efficiency (you will need to use less of it) is worth the two or three dollars more in price than most of its competition. The so-called low priced "bargain brands" generally don't compare.
Cheaper than tide podsCleans whites very whiteComes well packaged , delivered on timeWould order again
Ptoduct is as you'd expect and I got it for a good price.
Fast Delivery and well known product

Tide Free & Gentle liquid laundry detergent has become a staple in my household. As someone with sensitive skin, this detergent has proven to be a game-changer. It effectively cleans clothes while being gentle on the skin, causing no irritations or allergic reactions. The scent-free formula is a bonus for those who prefer a more neutral fragrance. The cleaning power is impressive, tackling stains and leaving clothes fresh and clean. The easy-to-use packaging and the fact that it’s suitable for high-efficiency machines make it a practical choice. Tide Free & Gentle has earned its spot as my go-to laundry detergent.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es bueno y se puede dejar de usar el enjuague.
